p: Similarity among different P. australis populations and population groups was calculated using Euclidean distance performed on standardized variables [ 97], while hierarchical cluster analysis between populations was carried out on distance values using the R package pvclust [ 98]. We characterized haplotypes and plotted the phenotypic distribution for each trait using the R ggpubr program [ 99]. Principal components analysis (PCA) with phenotypic traits was applied to examine the pattern of phylogeographic groups, and how close they were to each other. PCA was performed using the Facto Mine R package [ 100].
